__e: It's the priest who gave it to me at my wedding.
You too want to prepare me to die, ...like the priest, who comes to give me the communion?
[The parish priest in that small world...] [... that revolves around his bell tower...] [... overlooking the Po, and tells a true tale each day...] [... to the great, placid river. ]
Besides, you're... you're the only priest I know who happens to be my brother.
Listen, isn't part of the priestly thing... giving relationship advice?
